explains: n. 细长的列；收割的刈痕；收割的宽度

sentences.en: Or a swath of unbroken, unblemished skin?
sentences.cn: 还是一片没有破损、没有污点的皮肤？

sentences.en: I see this affecting a wide swath of companies.
sentences.cn: 我认为，这影响到范围相当广的一批公司。

sentences.en: That singer cut a swath on the stage in the small town.
sentences.cn: 那个歌手在这个小镇的舞台上出尽了风头。
